titleStmt.title: A New method of curing the French-pox written by an eminent French author ; together with the practice and method of Monsieur Blanchard ; as also Dr. Sydenham's judgment on the same ; to which is added annotations and observations by William Salmon.
titleStmt.author: Sydenham, Thomas, 1624-1689.
Blankaart, Steven, 1650-1702. Venus belegert en ontset. English.
Salmon, William, 1644-1713. Annotations and observations.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Taylor ... and Thomas Newborough ...,

notesStmt.note: "Unclear as to which section, if any, is by Thomas Sydenham"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.

"Some curious problems : in which the finest questions that can be proposed concerning the venereal distemper are resolved" (p. [105]-161), and, "Mr. Stephen Blankards's practice relating to the venereal distemper and the accidents thereunto belonging" (p. [163]-256) each have special t.p.
Reproduction of original in the Radcliffe Camera, Oxford University.
